TemplateConfiguration._Description: An XML property list file that describes a product.

TemplateFiles.File: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.0"> <dict> <key>os</key> <array> <string>10.6.6</string> </array> <key>arch</key> <array> <string>i386</string> </array> </dict> </plist>
